page.description: You can configure a hyperlink control in a List to open the associated e-mail client and fill in the 'to' address with a field.

section.description: To configure a hyperlink to open an e-mail client, set the 'Action type' to 'Email' and the 'Email address' to the value you want to put into the email client's 'to' address field. You can use placeholders in the 'Email address' property to refer to data in a field in the current row of the List.
